Today in Cornwall, North is lighting up with 5 ft @ 11s W swell and light SSE winds, making for clean conditions at spots like Crantock and Fistral. Tomorrow, the swell builds to 7 ft @ 14s W with light ESE winds, keeping it fun and manageable across the North coast. Day after, conditions ease slightly with 5 ft @ 13s W swell and moderate N winds, still offering workable waves. Best: tomorrow.
